name: MicrosoftToDoList(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, start To Do list”
”Alexa, ask To Do list to add watering flowers”
”Alexa, ask To Do list to remove watering flowers”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: to do list
des:
Integrates the default task list from Microsoft To Do. This plugin is not provided by Microsoft, but is a private development. It requires a Microsoft account and a To Do list. The Microsoft account must be linked to the Alexa skill. This can be done either on the skill's website or in the Alexa app. The skill responds “I have added an entry to the To Do task list.” If the entry is different, the entry has been written to your Alexa list. This should not happen if the commands below are used correctly. Please contact me at falk@surrounded.de if you have a problem. Thank you very much!

The possible commands are:
- Alexa, ask To Do list (to) add watering flowers 

- Alexa, ask To Do list (to) remove watering flowers
- Alexa, ask To Do list (to) delete watering flowers

If "and" appears in the task description, several tasks are created. Example: "Alexa, tell To Do task list add watering flowers and mowing lawn" creates the tasks "watering flowers" and "mowing lawn".
